page.title: 14HOLTON AREA RELIGION
page.content:
HOLTON- All Saints Church. Register dates from 1560. Rectory now in private ownership.
LISSINGTON- St. John the Baptist Church. Register dates from 1562. Vicarage now in private ownership. Methodist Church built in mid 19th. Century. Part of the Market Rasen and Caistor Circuit. The Minister is Rev. Farmery of Market Rasen.
WICKENBY- St. Peter and St. Lawrence Church. Register dates from 1558. Old Rectory now in private ownership. New Rectory built in 1985.
The 3 Anglican Churches form part of the Wickenby Group of Parishes. Rev. Victor Irwin has recently been inducted to the Group after an Interregnum of several years.
